itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Ronald "Ron"/"Ronnie" James (5 February 1938) is a Welsh former rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s, 1960s and 1970s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Ystalyfera RFC and Maesteg RFC, as a fullback, i.e. number 15, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Other Nationalities and Commonwealth XIII, and at club level for Halifax (Heritage № 715), as a fullback, i.e. number 1.

response: *Po James (Ronald James, born 1949), American football running back
*Ronald James, Welsh rugby league footballer of the 1960s and 1970s for Commonwealth XIII, and Halifax
